Control Name: 5.2.6 Ensure that Activity Log Alert exists for Create or Update Security Solution (Scored)
Control Statement: Monitoring for Create or Update Security Solution events gives insight into changes to the active security solutions and may reduce the time it takes to detect suspicious activity.
